data.notes: Injuries vary by three types: Moderate, Serious and Grievous Injuries. When determining an Injury, roll a D100, referring to the relevant table below. In addition, player characters gain 3 Conflict for Moderate Injuries, 6 Conflict for Serious Injuries and 9 Conflict for Grievous Injuries. Finally, combatants cannot heal their Damage & Peril Condition Tracks until Injuries are in Recuperation.

effect.@en: You are Bleeding. A caretaker must Perform Surgery. If the surgery is failed or if 24 hours pass, you gain the Headmould-Shot Permanent Injury. If you already have this Permanent Injury, you are Slain! instead. Until fully Recuperated, you suffer -9% Intelligence.
